100.message: I don't know if developer's salary pays as much as been a supper hero.
100.name: Concerned Citizen

101.message: Try to look for a Junior position instead. You are just learning.
101.name: Concerned Citizen

102.message: I'm just want to try something different.
102.name: Concerned Citizen

103.message: Why you want to do that? You don't like to be part of the JL?
103.name: Concerned Citizen

104.message: I'm looking for a job as a senior web developer.
104.name: Concerned Citizen
